content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting System at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Stone furnace at (-17.0, -51.0)
Currently not operational - drill has no fuel, furnace has no fuel but contains 10 iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting System at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0)
- Stone furnace at (-20.0, -71.0) with 4 coal
System blocked - furnace contains 2 iron plates and 9 copper ore

### Power Generation System at (-14.5, 19.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) - working and producing water
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) with 10 coal
- Steam engine at (-8.5, 19.5)
- Multiple pipe groups in various states:
  - One water-filled pipe group (system 11442)
  - 15 empty pipe groups attempting connections
System still not operational - connection issues persist

### Research Lab System
Consists of:
- Lab with automation science packs (10)
Currently not operational due to no power

### Unused Smelting Area
Group of 4 unused furnaces at:
- (0.0, 0.0)
- (2.0, 0.0)
- (2.0, 4.0)
- (4.0, 4.0)
All have fuel (23 coal each) but no ingredients

### Electricity Distribution Network
Electric pole network (Group ID 2520) connecting various areas but currently not operational (0 voltage)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Connection Issues
- Connection points between components are being blocked - ensure proper spacing and alignment
- Remove blocking pipe groups before attempting new connections
- Maintain clear paths between connection points of boiler, pump and steam engine
- Create direct, minimal pipe connections instead of complex networks

### Production Line Blockages
- Mining drills are getting blocked due to full output furnaces
- Implement regular collection of finished products from furnaces

### Resource Management
- Coal shortages in critical components - maintain coal supply for mining drills
- Better inventory management needed - agent frequently runs out of coal while having excess of other materials

### Pipe System Issues
- Too many redundant pipe groups being created (15+ groups)
- Clean up ALL pipe groups before creating new connections
- Create minimal, direct connections between components
- Focus on one connection at a time: water to boiler first, then boiler to steam engine

### Power Distribution
- Lab and other electrical components remain unpowered
- Focus on completing one working power generation setup before expanding the network
- Ensure both water and steam connections are properly established before expecting power generation

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items
- Maintain a minimum stock of essential resources like coal
